name: Demoflick
tag_list: demo-videos, software-demo-videos, explainer-videos, animated-videos, animated-software-demos, web-video, tradeshow-videos
overview:
We build awesome explainer videos for websites!

DemoFlick is owned and operated by NextTraffic a marketing agency based in Boston, MA. DemoFlick was launched with a simple idea in mind. We wanted to build brilliant, memorable, and engaging video content for our clients using motion graphics & 3D. The managing partners of DemoFlick pioneered the “Video Spokesperson” technology way back in the year 2006. We feel DemoFlick AKA “Demo Videos” AKA “How It Works” Videos are the next big thing in converting visitors into customers online. Motion Design & 3D allows companies to explain their value proposition like never before.

We’re storytellers first and foremost! Our team is made up of an array of experts in Online Video, Motion Design, Illustration, Storyboarding, Copywriting, Lead Conversion, Web Design, Lady Gaga, Composition, and more.

We understand that your message is important and our job is to take web visitors on a path from slightly interested, to extremely interested, to clients. We understand the importance of a deadline! We are artists first and foremost…but we have a keen understanding of customer service and deliverability.

Give us a try….Let us tell your story! DemoFlick = Demonstration Films for Businesses.
